SNMP Generic

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


SNMP Ricoh Printers

Overview

Tested Printers:

  • MP C5503
  • IPSiO SP 6320.

Display Items:

  • Counter (Total and Pages per Minute)
  • Tray Level
  • Tonor Level
  • Option Parts Status

Graph Items:

  • Page Counter per Minute

Author

330k

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

SNMP Ricoh Printers

Overview

Tested Printers:

  • MP C5503
  • IPSiO SP 6320.

Display Items:

  • Counter (Total and Pages per Minute)
  • Tray Level
  • Tonor Level
  • Option Parts Status

Graph Items:

  • Page Counter per Minute
